definitions.definition: to have a feeling as if a lot of sharp points are being put quickly and lightly into your body:
examples: My fingers and toes are tingling with the cold.

definitions.definition: When you tingle with an emotion, such as excitement or fear, you feel it very strongly:
examples: She tingled with fear as she entered the dark alleyway.

definitions.definition: a feeling as if a lot of sharp points are being put quickly and lightly into your body:
examples: There's a slight tingle in my wrists.
